user.name: The Alliance for Secure AI
user.description: Mitigating AI Risks and Protecting Humanity.

fullText:
AI-generated community college applications in California: 
2021: 20%
2024: 25%
2025: 34%  

Scammers have used AI bots to steal more than $13 million in federal and state financial aid from California Community Colleges in just one year.
